ParameterTypes.Name: ServerUrl
ParameterTypes.Description: The server endpoint for the provider

ParameterTypes.Name: UserName
ParameterTypes.Description: The user name for the provider

ParameterTypes.Name: RateLimitDuration
ParameterTypes.Description: The duration for the rate limit

ParameterTypes.Name: RateLimitMax
ParameterTypes.Description: The max number of messages within the duration
